dialogue: The Militia eventually finished cleaning up the camp.
A militia commander walked up to Spirit.
Hey, who are you? Why are you at our camp?
Are you the one who killed all the Empire's soldiers?
...I'm Spirit. I was sent over by Whisk.
I was supposed to deliver a warning about an ambush
but I guess I was a step too late.
As for that other thing...This is Tom. He's the one who did it.
Woah! So, you're both Whisk's? Hah! I'm glad we
have some useful new recruits! You'll both
be useful in the field, especially this 'Tom'!
...Neither of us is going to be going to serve in the field.
Besides, Tom isn't related to the Militia.
Hm...So you don't want to fight for our cause?
Well, not a big deal. After all, you'd probably just be
as good as any other soldier. We can live without you.
But I'm afraid we can't let Tom go.
You say he's not involved, but after that display?
We can't possibly let him go.
His power could prove too useful if he joins us.
And if he doesn't it could prove a threat...
The commander moved to grab Tom, but Spirit got in his way.
No! I'm not letting you!
Mrrrnn...
The commander sighed at Spirit's resistance.
After backing away a bit, he made a motion
with his hand, and his soldiers raised their guns.
Before Spirit could react, several bullets fired at her.
Spirit fell to the ground and Tom fumbled with her.
She stared up at the face of the commander.
I'm sorry, but this is for our goals, for the sake of peace.
Thanks to you, my soldiers could live, and I thank you for that.
Its a shame .
I hope you get a better shot in the afterlife.
Spirit finally lost conciousness, and faded away forever...
